iiv.dialog

Class GotoPointDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog
              • iiv.dialog.CNUDialog
                • iiv.dialog.GotoPointDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CoordinateMappable, NumberFormattable, ShowPointDisplay, ShowStatus, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class GotoPointDialog
extends CNUDialog
implements ShowPointDisplay, CoordinateMappable, NumberFormattable
    Dialog to get crop and other image limits from user.
    Since:
    iiV1.1
    See Also:
    CNUDisplay, DisplayComponent, Serialized Form

      • showPoint

        public boolean showPoint(int[] point,
                         double value,
                         double factor,
                         java.lang.String name,
                         XYZDouble xyzpt,
                         java.lang.String mapName)
        Display information about a point including Talairach coordinates.
        Specified by:
        showPoint in interface ShowPointDisplay
        Parameters:
        point - array of indices specifying the point location
        value - value of voxel at point location
        factor - quantification factor for voxel value
        name - name of object source of the voxel
        xyzpt - point location in talairach coordinates
        mapName - name of map used convert to talairach coordinates
        Returns:
        true if info displayed, false otherwise
        See Also:
        ShowPointDialog, CoordinateMap
